amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit expenditure of funds by the Department of the Navy to divest or transfer, or prepare to divest or transfer, any search and rescue units from the Marine Corps.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit expenditure of funds by the Department of the Navy to divest or transfer, or prepare to divest or transfer, any search and rescue units from the Marine Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 347 (Roll no. 350).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 347 (Roll no. 350).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Gosar.
